title: Poro Tattoos.
body:
Just wanted to share our new fresh tattoos as a symbol of love to league of legends. 
Laugh at us, call us weird, we don't care, we like it. :)

replies.body:
Aside from the fact that your artist wasn't the best (line work and shading is iffy, I used to do tattoos.), this is ADORABLE AND I WANT ONE!
Maybe it would go well with my Chocobo-Mog on my forearm :) 
LOVE it!

Wow you gotta show me your Chocobo tattoo.
And thanks for your lovely comment! :D

Haha.
They are lovely.
 For the boy on the left, take care of yourself ❤
If you don't mind me asking, what happened to the arm on the left? There's many scars.

A Cho'Gath's bite.
Nah just a stupid phase long time ago, nothing special. :)
Cait Sith Nunu skin. Riot pls.

Meh. Wouldn't have gotten the same on both arms. 

Woulda got 

{{summoner:31}}  and {{item:2054}} 

All the same, not bad.
Didn't understand if you think I did two Poros on both of my arms or just thought it would be better if my friend or I would get the cookie instead.
Not to burst the bubble so quickly, but no tongues sticking out?

These tattoos were really spontaneous, don't blame us :(
But now that I think about it, yeah that could be so much better to do, I hope we can still add a tongue somehow.
It's in the profile picture on my stream, and you can see it on the stream videos easily, Twitch.TV/KailaTime
It isn't finished :) YAY GAMER TATTOOS!!!

Wow, it looks great, seriously. Would really like a Chocobo/Mog tattoo as well. FF means alot to me.
And yeah, gamer tattoos ftw! gonna fill my left arm with gaming tattoos, at least half of it. just started! :)
